channel.title: Game crashes climbing down the ladder after killing the tentacles
channel.description: On blast pit after killing the tentacles I proceed to climb down the ladder where the tentacles were after the level loads if I look directly down the game crashes but if I look almost directly down it wont, this lets me continue to the bottom but if I look straight or around the area where the ladder was the game crashes. So this makes the stage impassable. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T22_23_13C0.mdmp (108 KB)

item.title: Game crashes climbing down the ladder after killing the tentacles
item.dc:creator: Rapid107
item.description:
On blast pit after killing the tentacles I proceed to climb down the ladder where the tentacles were after the level loads if I look directly down the game crashes but if I look almost directly down it wont, this lets me continue to the bottom but if I look straight or around the area where the ladder was the game crashes. So this makes the stage impassable.
